<i class='icon-music'></i> Concert: Big.desc: As a part of the Lake Anna Concert Series, Big Band style performers The Swinging 87s will be performing at 11:30AM and the Glenn Miller Orchestra will be performing at 7:00PM on Wednesday, July 24 at the Lake Anna Park Gazebo

<i class='icon-leaf'></i> Farmers Market.desc: There will be a farmers market in downtown on Wednesday from 2 to 6. Fresh produce from local vendors, baked goods, jams, jellies, honey, syrup, flowers, health information & screening, cooking & vegetable carving demonstrations, gardening tips, kid's day, free market bag & shopper incentives. Fun for the whole family!

<i class='icon-music'></i> Concert: Sati.desc: As a part of the Lake Anna Concert Series, Rolling Stones style performers Satisfaction will be performing at 7:30PM on Friday, July 26 at the Lake Anna Park Gazebo

Change for Change.desc:
This month's Change for Change funds will be donated to: Youth Action Fund
August 1, 4:30-7:00 at Hodges

<i class='icon-flag-checkered'></i> Crui.desc:
Classic vehicle display, music, great food, shopping, contests, and loads of fun! Sponsored by NDS.
When: July 18 5-8pm
Where: W Tuscarawas Ave & 5th St NW

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Offices C.desc: City offices will be closed July 4th in observance of Independence Day. The finance department will also be closed July 5th.

<i class='icon-group'></i> Age Well Comm.desc: Be sure to check out Age Well Community Barberton, it is an online destination designed to connect older adults to a variety of resources to help them flourish and thrive in the Barberton community.
